name: Create FreshBooks clients from new rows in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row in Google Sheets is created, Make will create a FreshBooks client out of it. To make sure the scenario works fine check if your spreadsheet corresponds to this (example)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1u-lOJ_slHk-2L0j0DosPEqmsd11SO91OhKDdk0NmiLc/edit?usp=sharing].
